channel.title: Login Error
channel.description:
Hey guys well before i start i wanna say that i wouldn't be coming here if i hadn't tried everything i knew i previously had a 667/729 but recently decided to develop on the Matrix 718 i have managed to edit a lot of things i have a half working squeal of fortune and an 80% g/e no bugs but today as i tried to log on i got an error while trying to log in, i type the username and password in, press enter then it says loading please wait, then it gives me an error and returns me to the login screen, this is the error i get.
[img]https://www.dropbox.com/s/tcm3y7dslehcopq/Untitled.png[/img]
if you know what to do to fix this error please post the solution or pm me it thanks. or if you have had this error or similar to it then please bump :)
Thanks to everyone for reading and/or helping :)

item.title: Login Error
item.dc:creator: @stonyadam stonyadam
